rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with traditional Kerala-style decor, central to the plan.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Open space adjoining the living room for family dining.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen with modern amenities integrated into a traditional design.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom with en-suite bathroom and balcony.

rooms.description: Secondary guest bedroom with adjoining private balcony.

rooms.name: Maid Room/Utility

rooms.name: Car Garage/Parking
rooms.description: Secure parking space integrated into the ground floor plan.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom with an expansive balcony oriented east for Vastu alignment.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom designed in traditional Kerala style.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Another bedroom with sufficient space and balcony.

rooms.name: Balcony Area
rooms.description: Common open space adjoining the bedrooms for outdoor relaxation.

rooms.name: Bathroom Suite
rooms.description: Comprehensive bathroom suite attached to the master bedroom.
